visual.name: PowerBI-visuals-template
visual.description:
Some description

Service prerequisites: R-powered custom visual is used in service seamlessly

Desktop prerequisites: To run R scripts in Power BI Desktop, you must separately install R on your local computer.
You can download and install R for free from the Revolution Open download page or the CRAN Repository

R package dependencies(auto-installed): some packages

Supports R versions: R 3.3.1, R 3.3.0, MRO 3.3.1, MRO 3.3.0

degree.description: degree of locally-fitted polynomial in seasonal extraction and trend extraction

robustToOutliers.description: logical indicating if robust fitting be used in the loess procedure

model.description: switch between additive and multiplicative decomposition models

cranPackages.name: ggplot2
cranPackages.displayName: ggplot2: An Implementation of the Grammar of Graphics
